sentences.en: A good example a university job like a teaching or research asistanshipresearch assistantship.
sentences.cn: 在大学任助教或助理研究员就是个不错的例子.

sentences.en: CEO Currier says Emode wanted to make the process easier and more meaningful.
sentences.cn: 首席执行官Currier说,Emode使择偶过程更容易,也更有意义.

sentences.en: I lived up at Radcliffe, in Currier House.
